issue.title: Arrow recipe removed from homebrew
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4325](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4325). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Homebrew maintainers recently removed the arrow recipe, <https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/pull/36063> because apparently it was failing with recent versions of arrow.

We were using the homebrew recipe for installing arrow on macOS during the R package installation, so we would need to fix the issue and re-submit arrow to homebrew.

This might not be a huge immediate priority, but it definitely needs to be done before the R package is on CRAN
